solution_line_template: Maria wants to give away {given_to_friend} cookies, so she will be left with {initial_cookies} - {given_to_friend} = <<{initial_cookies}-{given_to_friend}={cookies_after_friend}>>{cookies_after_friend} cookies.
Half of these will go to her family, which means {cookies_after_friend} / {half_divisor} = <<{cookies_after_friend}/{half_divisor}={cookies_after_family}>>{cookies_after_family} cookies.
So she will be left with {cookies_after_family} - {cookies_eaten} = <<{cookies_after_family}-{cookies_eaten}={cookies_left}>>{cookies_left} cookies.
